venue.name: Community Boating Boathouse on the Esplanade

item.description:
Let's take a walk along the Charles River and make some new international friends. We'll talk for an hour or more along the Charles River.

We'll meet at 1:45 in front of Community Boating Boathouse. This is close to the Charles MGH T station (red line). Walk across the bridge to the river and it will be on your left.  There are a few green benches across from the front door of the boathouse, so I'll wait there.

We'll wait until 2:00 pm, but then we'll start walking so don't be late.

I'll include pictures of the location later this week.  Keep your fingers crossed for nice weather!

 

(Extra note: You can also get there walking from the Green Line T- Arlington Station, walk to the river and over the highway overpass. At the bottom of the ramp on the river side, turn right and walk along the river heading downtown to get to Community Boating Boathouse. Have fun! Reece)

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Sun 5/27 @ 1:45p! Take a walk on the Esplanade (by Community Boating Boathouse)
